title: Postgame Show: Baseball Needs Its Superstar
description:
As we head into the College Football weekend and Aaron Judge continues to chase HR No. 62, we discuss ESPN's strategy to continue to cut into live events with Judge coverage.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
